Class AIMoveCoordinator

java.lang.Object
UI.controller.AIMoveCoordinator
public final class AIMoveCoordinator extends Object
AIMoveCoordinator: manages AI agents, handles move requests on background threads, and ensures moves are applied on the JavaFX Application thread.

  • Method Details

    • hasAnyAIAgent

      public boolean hasAnyAIAgent()
      Checks if any AI agents are registered.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one AI agent registered; false otherwise

    • isAIControlled

      public boolean isAIControlled(Player player)
      Checks if the specified player is controlled by an AI agent.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if the player is controlled by an AI agent; false otherwise

    • isThinking

      public boolean isThinking()
      Checks if an AI agent is currently thinking.
      Returns:
      true if an AI agent is processing a move; false otherwise

    • addAgent

      public void addAgent(Player player, AIAgent agent)
      Registers an AI agent for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be controlled by the AI agent
      agent - the AI agent to register

    • removeAgent

      public void removeAgent(Player player)
      Removes the AI agent associated with the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose AI agent should be removed

    • removeAllAgents

      public void removeAllAgents()
      Removes all registered AI agents and cleans up resources.

    • invalidate

      public void invalidate()
      Invalidates the current AI state, cancelling any ongoing computations.

    • requestMove

      public boolean requestMove(Player player, Supplier<AIBoardAdapter> snapshotSupplier, Consumer<Move> onMoveReady, boolean delayed)
      Requests a move from the AI agent controlling the specified player.

      The AI computation is performed on a background thread, and the resulting move is delivered via the provided callback on the JavaFX Application thread.

      Parameters:
      player - the player for whom to request a move
      snapshotSupplier - a supplier that provides a snapshot of the current board state
      onMoveReady - a callback to receive the computed move
      delayed - if true, introduces a slight delay before starting computation
      Returns:
      true if an AI agent was found and the request was initiated; false otherwise

    • deliverMove

      private void deliverMove(Consumer<Move> onMoveReady, Move move)
      Delivers the computed move to the provided callback on the JavaFX Application thread.
      Parameters:
      onMoveReady - the callback to receive the move
      move - the computed move
